description: An array of all of the existing cards in Flesh and Blood, with each item being a unique card.

unique_id.description: A UUID representing the card within this data set.

pitch.description: The pitch value of the card. Can be a number or blank.

cost.description: The cost of the card. Can be a number, X, XX, X and a number, or blank.

power.description: The power of the card. Can be a number, *, X, or blank.

defense.description: The defense of the card. Can be a number, *, or blank.

health.description: The health of the card. Can be a number or blank.

intelligence.description: The intelligence of the card. Can be a number or blank.

types.description: The types of the card (includes all types, subtypes, etc).

card_keywords.description: The keywords inherent to the card. Includes conditional keywords, but does not include keywords that are part of the card's activated and triggered abilities.

abilities_and_effects.description: The activated abilities and once per turn effects of the cards. Just contains what type of ability it is, not the ability itself. (Ex: Once per Turn Action)

ability_and_effect_keywords.description: The keywords that are part of the card's activated and triggered abilities.

granted_keywords.description: The keywords that the card grants to other objects.

functional_text.description: The functional text of the card, formatted in Markdown.

functional_text_plain.description: The functional text of the card, formatted in plain text.

flavor_text.description: The flavor text of the card, formatted in Markdown.

flavor_text_plain.description: The flavor text of the card, formatted in plain text.

type_text.description: The full type text box of the card.

played_horizontally.description: A boolean representing if the card is played and displayed horizontally.

blitz_legal.description: A boolean representing if the card is legal in Blitz (not including bans or suspensions).

cc_legal.description: A boolean representing if the card is legal in Classic Constructed (not including bans or suspensions).

commoner_legal.description: A boolean representing if the card is legal in Commoner (not including bans or suspensions).

blitz_living_legend.description: A boolean representing if the card is Living Legend in Blitz.

cc_living_legend.description: A boolean representing if the card is Living Legend in Classic Constructed.

blitz_banned.description: Represents if the card is currently banned in Blitz. Contains the date it was banned, otherwise it is null.

cc_banned.description: Represents if the card is currently banned in Classic Constructed. Contains the date it was banned, otherwise it is null.

commoner_banned.description: Represents if the card is currently banned in Commoner. Contains the date it was banned, otherwise it is null.

upf_banned.description: Represents if the card is currently banned in Ultimate Pit Fight. Contains the date it was banned, otherwise it is null.

blitz_suspended_start.description: Represents if the card is currently suspended in Blitz. Contains the date it was suspended, otherwise it is null.

blitz_suspended_end.description: Represents when the card is set to be unsuspended in Blitz. Contains a displayable text describing when it will be unsuspended if it is currently suspended, otherwise it is null.

cc_suspended_start.description: Represents if the card is currently suspended in Classic Constructed. Contains the date it was suspended, otherwise it is null.

cc_suspended_end.description: Represents when the card is set to be unsuspended in Classic Constructed. Contains a displayable text describing when it will be unsuspended if it is currently suspended, otherwise it is null.

commoner_suspended_start.description: Represents if the card is currently suspended in Commoner. Contains the date it was suspended, otherwise it is null.

commoner_suspended_end.description: Represents when the card is set to be unsuspended in Commoner. Contains a displayable text describing when it will be unsuspended if it is currently suspended, otherwise it is null.

printings.description: Contains a list of objects representing the various printings of the card.

id.description: The ID of the card printing.

set_id.description: The ID of the set the card is printed in.

edition.description: The edition of the set the card is printed in.

foilings.description: The foilings the card printing comes in.

items.description: A shortcode representing an individual foiling.

rarity.description: A shortcode representing the rarity the card printing was printed at.

artist.description: The artist of the card printing.

art_variation.description: A shortcode representing the special art treatment or variation the card was printed with, if any.

image_url.description: An official LSS image URL of the card printing, if it exists.
